ModMetaData.name: Less Rebuff
ModMetaData.author: KapTaiN_KaVerN, Dingo
ModMetaData.description: Reduces the stack limit of the following mood penalties relating to romance to x1: - Failed to romance someone. - Someone failed to romance me. - Someone broke-up with me. - Someone cheated on me. - Someone divorced me. - Someone rejected my marriage proposal.
